sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"态度，风度"之意。
means: attitude ：普通用词，指对人或事情的看法和采取的行为，多有某种不很明确或不便明说的感情色彩。
air ：含义广泛。单数形式指某人脸上表现出的心理活动，或言谈举止；复数形式指某人故意做作而摆出的架子。
manner ：多指某人在某一场合的言谈举止等。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"态度，立场"之意。
means: stand ： 常指某人对某一问题的看法或立场，有时含个人感情色彩。
attitude ： 普通用词，指对于事情的看法和采取的行动，多带不很显确或不便说明的感情色彩。
position ： 指对看法有分歧的问题所表示较冷静和节制的态度，常常是经认真考虑后决定的。

word_mean: 体态，姿势：在产科中指胎儿身体各部分的相互关系。正常体态系所有的关节中度屈曲，背向前弓，头在胸前微屈，手臂和腿可向所有的自然方向自由运动(体型)
态度，意向：对其他个体、机构或活动程序做积极或消极反应的倾向
指遥感器或遥感平台对某一参考系所处的角方位。

sentence.Network_en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentence.Network_cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentence.Network_en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
sentence.Network_cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

sentence.Network_en: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.--Zig Ziglar
sentence.Network_cn: 决定你人生高度的，不是你的才能，而是你的态度。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 态度(attITude)：是指对人、事、物所把持的正面或反面评价，它反映了个体对人事物的感受。
(A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... attentive a. 注意的；有礼貌的 attitude n. 态度，看法；姿势 attract vt. 吸引；引起，诱惑.

list.abs: ...de stabilization)根据姿态误差（测量值与标称值之差）形成控制指令，产生控制力矩来实现姿态控制的方法。要求对三个轴进行姿态控制的航天器（见航天器三轴姿态控制）通常采用主动姿态控制。主动姿态控制系统由姿态敏感器、控制器和执行机构（也称力矩器）组成。按是否采用专门的控制力矩装置和姿态测量装置，可以把航天器的姿态控制分为被动姿态控制和主动姿态控制两类。 【姿态扰动】（attitude disturbance）在轨道上运动的航天器受各种力(通过航天器质心)和力矩(不通过航天器质心)的作用，其中
369太阳同步卫星sun－synchronous satellite370卫星姿态satellite attitude371遥感平台remote sensing platform
本研究主要在探讨科学态度（scientific attitude）之其中一项成分-慎下断语的科学态度。Shrigley 等人（1988）指出科学态度的成分必须界定清.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (denoting the placing or posture of a figure in art): from French, from Italian attitudine 'fitness, posture', from late Latin aptitudo, from aptus 'fit'

entry.tran: （尤指从行为中表现出来的）态度，看法
entry.def: Your attitude to something is the way that you think and feel about it, especially when this shows in the way you behave.

example.ex: ...the general change in attitude towards handicapped people...
example.tran: 对残疾人态度的整体转变

example.ex: Being unemployed produces negative attitudes to work...
example.tran: 失业会产生对工作的消极态度。

entry.tran: 个人风格;（尤指）咄咄逼人的作派
entry.def: If you refer to someone as a person with attitude, you mean that they have a striking and individual style of behaviour, especially a forceful or aggressive one.

example.ex: Patti Smith and Janis Joplin did it all years ago and they were women with attitude and talent.
example.tran: 帕蒂·史密斯和詹妮斯·乔普林多年前就这样做过，她们当时是两位个性鲜明的才女。

entry.def: Your attitude of mind is your general way of thinking and feeling.

example.ex: Writing calls for a critical attitude of mind that he did not possess.
example.tran: 写作需要有批判性思维，而这正是他所不具备的。

means.word_mean: 1. a complex mental state involving beliefs and feelings and values and dispositions to act in certain ways;

sentences.sentence: "he had the attitude that work was fun"

means.word_mean: 2. position or arrangement of the body and its limbs;
3. a theatrical pose created for effect;

sentences.sentence: "the actor struck just the right attitude"

means.word_mean: 4. position of aircraft or spacecraft relative to a frame of reference (the horizon or direction of motion)

example.en: The officer said he would bring order to the gathering with his attitude-adjuster.
example.zh: 警官说，他要用警棍来让人群恢复秩序。

auth_sentence.content: It's hard to question an attitude so upbeat.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's hard to question an attitude so upbeat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's hard to question an attitude so upbeat.

auth_sentence.content: We just lost the battle of emotion and attitude.
auth_sentence.res_content: We just lost the battle of emotion and attitude.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We just lost the battle of emotion and attitude.

auth_sentence.content: First there needs to be a change of attitude.
auth_sentence.res_content: First there needs to be a change of attitude.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: First there needs to be a change of attitude.

stems_affixes.word_buile: att=apt适应+itude性质,状态等→n.态度,看法[to,toward,about];姿势
beat幸福+itude性质,状态等→n.至福,十分幸福
lass懒+itude性质,状态等→n.无力,没精打采

stems_affixes.value_cn: 纬度,行动或言论的自由[范围],[
stems_affixes.word_buile: lat宽,阔+itude性质,状态等→宽的状态→纬度,行动或言论的自由
plen满+itude性质,状态等→n.完全,大量
sol单独+itude状态→单独的状态→孤独

Sentence.sentence: Participation in this project helped the girls developed a new attitude towards their parents of their own homes; they've learned how to work with tools, and improve their work habits.
This information not only tells us what people are eating but also tells us about the changes in attitudes and tastes
Instead of having a literal meaning, it docs something - conveying an attitude — just like the -ed ending conveys past tense rather than "meaning.
His attitude to student government has changed

sentences.cn: 他们持一种暧昧的态度。

sentences.en: What's your attitude to[towards] this idea?
sentences.cn: 你对这种意见看法如何?

sentences.en: In the photo she stands in the attitude of a sailor looking afar.
sentences.cn: 在照片中, 她摆出水手伫立远望的姿势。

sentences.en: She received guests with a respectful attitude.
sentences.cn: 她恭恭敬敬地接待了客人。

jushi.english: I don't care what attitude you take.
jushi.chinese: 我不管你采取什么态度。

jushi.english: As she went into the room,she saw toys lying in tumbled attitude on the floor.
jushi.chinese: 她走进房间便看见地板上乱七八糟的玩具。

jushi.english: They sat around in easy attitudes.
jushi.chinese: 他们以轻松自在的姿势坐在四周。
